topic.title: HPE Helion Public Cloud CLI Software for Windows PowerShell: Block Storage Examples

body.p: This page provides you some examples of how to use the various commands (sometimes called "cmdlets") for HPE Helion Public Cloud CLI software for Windows PowerShell implementation of Compute.

section.title: Navigation
section.p: To execute HPE Helion Public Cloud commands in Windows PowerShell, first open a Windows PowerShell window; under the Start menu, it is typically under All Programs > Accessories > Windows PowerShell.
